title: Authentication service token validation failing
short_description: Authentication service token validation failing
description: JWT token validation failing with 'Invalid signature' error. Users unable to access protected resources.
resolution: Rotated signing keys in auth service. Updated all microservices with new public key. Token validation working normally.
resolution_notes: Rotated signing keys in auth service. Updated all microservices with new public key. Token validation working normally.

title: Memory leak detected in storage-service
short_description: Memory leak detected in storage-service
description: Memory usage increasing steadily over 24 hours from 2GB to 7GB. Application not releasing memory after processing requests.
resolution: Identified memory leak in background job processor. Fixed unclosed database cursors. Deployed patch v2.3.1. Memory usage stable at 2.5GB.
resolution_notes: Identified memory leak in background job processor. Fixed unclosed database cursors. Deployed patch v2.3.1. Memory usage stable at 2.5GB.

title: Database connection pool exhausted on web-server
short_description: Database connection pool exhausted on web-server
description: Connection pool reached maximum limit of 100 connections. New connection requests timing out after 30 seconds.
resolution: Increased max_connections from 100 to 200. Implemented connection pooling with PgBouncer. Added connection timeout monitoring.
resolution_notes: Increased max_connections from 100 to 200. Implemented connection pooling with PgBouncer. Added connection timeout monitoring.

title: Background job queue backlog on auth-service
short_description: Background job queue backlog on auth-service
description: Job queue backlog reached 10,000 jobs. Processing time exceeding SLA by 2 hours.
resolution: Scaled worker nodes from 5 to 15. Optimized job processing logic. Backlog cleared in 45 minutes.
resolution_notes: Scaled worker nodes from 5 to 15. Optimized job processing logic. Backlog cleared in 45 minutes.

title: Network latency spike between api-gateway and database
short_description: Network latency spike between api-gateway and database
description: Network latency increased from 5ms to 150ms. Affecting all database operations.
resolution: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.
resolution_notes: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.

title: Authentication service token validation failing
short_description: Authentication service token validation failing
description: JWT token validation failing with 'Invalid signature' error. Users unable to access protected resources.
resolution: Rotated signing keys in auth service. Updated all microservices with new public key. Token validation working normally.
resolution_notes: Rotated signing keys in auth service. Updated all microservices with new public key. Token validation working normally.

title: Kubernetes pod crash loop on database
short_description: Kubernetes pod crash loop on database
description: Pod database-deployment-abc123 restarting continuously. CrashLoopBackOff state with 10 restarts in 5 minutes.
resolution: Identified missing environment variable DATABASE_URL. Added secret to deployment. Pod stable with 0 restarts.
resolution_notes: Identified missing environment variable DATABASE_URL. Added secret to deployment. Pod stable with 0 restarts.

title: Redis cache cluster node failure
short_description: Redis cache cluster node failure
description: One of three Redis nodes in europe-west1-b cluster failed. Cluster operating in degraded mode with reduced redundancy.
resolution: Replaced failed node. Rebalanced cluster slots. Verified data replication. All three nodes operational.
resolution_notes: Replaced failed node. Rebalanced cluster slots. Verified data replication. All three nodes operational.

title: Network latency spike between api-gateway and database
short_description: Network latency spike between api-gateway and database
description: Network latency increased from 5ms to 150ms. Affecting all database operations.
resolution: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.
resolution_notes: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.

title: Database connection pool exhausted on payment-service
short_description: Database connection pool exhausted on payment-service
description: Connection pool reached maximum limit of 100 connections. New connection requests timing out after 30 seconds.
resolution: Increased max_connections from 100 to 200. Implemented connection pooling with PgBouncer. Added connection timeout monitoring.
resolution_notes: Increased max_connections from 100 to 200. Implemented connection pooling with PgBouncer. Added connection timeout monitoring.

title: Slow query performance on auth-service database
short_description: Slow query performance on auth-service database
description: Query execution time increased from 200ms to 8 seconds. Affecting user dashboard load times.
resolution: Created missing index on user_id column. Optimized JOIN operation. Query time reduced to 150ms. Added query performance monitoring.
resolution_notes: Created missing index on user_id column. Optimized JOIN operation. Query time reduced to 150ms. Added query performance monitoring.

title: Disk space running low on email-service
short_description: Disk space running low on email-service
description: Available disk space below 15% on email-service. Log files consuming 80GB of 100GB total capacity.
resolution: Implemented log rotation policy (7 days retention). Compressed old logs. Freed up 60GB. Set up automated cleanup job.
resolution_notes: Implemented log rotation policy (7 days retention). Compressed old logs. Freed up 60GB. Set up automated cleanup job.

title: API Gateway returning 502 Bad Gateway errors
short_description: API Gateway returning 502 Bad Gateway errors
description: Users experiencing intermittent 502 errors when accessing email-service. Error rate at 15% of total requests.
resolution: Restarted nginx workers. Increased upstream timeout from 30s to 60s. Cleared connection pool. Error rate dropped to 0.1%.
resolution_notes: Restarted nginx workers. Increased upstream timeout from 30s to 60s. Cleared connection pool. Error rate dropped to 0.1%.

title: Database connection pool exhausted on auth-service
short_description: Database connection pool exhausted on auth-service

title: Authentication service token validation failing
short_description: Authentication service token validation failing
description: JWT token validation failing with 'Invalid signature' error. Users unable to access protected resources.
resolution: Rotated signing keys in auth service. Updated all microservices with new public key. Token validation working normally.
resolution_notes: Rotated signing keys in auth service. Updated all microservices with new public key. Token validation working normally.

title: Service mesh (Istio) sidecar injection failing
short_description: Service mesh (Istio) sidecar injection failing
description: New pod deployments failing because Istio sidecar not injecting. Services not joining mesh.
resolution: Restarted Istio control plane pods. Verified webhook configuration. Sidecar injection working on new deployments.
resolution_notes: Restarted Istio control plane pods. Verified webhook configuration. Sidecar injection working on new deployments.

title: Message queue (Kafka) consumer lag increasing
short_description: Message queue (Kafka) consumer lag increasing
description: Consumer lag on 'orders' topic increased to 50,000 messages. Processing delayed by 30 minutes.
resolution: Increased consumer instances from 3 to 6. Optimized message processing code. Lag cleared in 15 minutes.
resolution_notes: Increased consumer instances from 3 to 6. Optimized message processing code. Lag cleared in 15 minutes.

title: SSL certificate expiring in 7 days for cache-redis
short_description: SSL certificate expiring in 7 days for cache-redis
description: SSL certificate for cache-redis.example.com expires on 2025-11-23. HTTPS connections will fail after expiration.
resolution: Renewed SSL certificate using Let's Encrypt. Updated cert-manager configuration. Set up automated renewal 30 days before expiry.
resolution_notes: Renewed SSL certificate using Let's Encrypt. Updated cert-manager configuration. Set up automated renewal 30 days before expiry.

title: CDN cache hit rate dropped below 60%
short_description: CDN cache hit rate dropped below 60%
description: Cache hit rate decreased from 85% to 55%. Increased load on origin servers.
resolution: Updated cache-control headers. Increased TTL from 1 hour to 4 hours for static assets. Hit rate improved to 82%.
resolution_notes: Updated cache-control headers. Increased TTL from 1 hour to 4 hours for static assets. Hit rate improved to 82%.

title: High CPU utilization on database
short_description: High CPU utilization on database
description: CPU usage has exceeded 85% threshold on database in us-east1-b. Multiple users reporting slow response times.
resolution: Scaled up instance from n1-standard-2 to n1-standard-4. Added horizontal pod autoscaler. CPU normalized to 45%.
resolution_notes: Scaled up instance from n1-standard-2 to n1-standard-4. Added horizontal pod autoscaler. CPU normalized to 45%.

resolution_notes: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.

title: High CPU utilization on kubernetes-cluster
short_description: High CPU utilization on kubernetes-cluster
description: CPU usage has exceeded 85% threshold on kubernetes-cluster in us-central1-a. Multiple users reporting slow response times.
resolution: Scaled up instance from n1-standard-2 to n1-standard-4. Added horizontal pod autoscaler. CPU normalized to 45%.
resolution_notes: Scaled up instance from n1-standard-2 to n1-standard-4. Added horizontal pod autoscaler. CPU normalized to 45%.

title: Service mesh (Istio) sidecar injection failing
short_description: Service mesh (Istio) sidecar injection failing
description: New pod deployments failing because Istio sidecar not injecting. Services not joining mesh.
resolution: Restarted Istio control plane pods. Verified webhook configuration. Sidecar injection working on new deployments.
resolution_notes: Restarted Istio control plane pods. Verified webhook configuration. Sidecar injection working on new deployments.

title: API Gateway returning 502 Bad Gateway errors
short_description: API Gateway returning 502 Bad Gateway errors
description: Users experiencing intermittent 502 errors when accessing email-service. Error rate at 15% of total requests.
resolution: Restarted nginx workers. Increased upstream timeout from 30s to 60s. Cleared connection pool. Error rate dropped to 0.1%.
resolution_notes: Restarted nginx workers. Increased upstream timeout from 30s to 60s. Cleared connection pool. Error rate dropped to 0.1%.

title: Kubernetes pod crash loop on message-queue
short_description: Kubernetes pod crash loop on message-queue
description: Pod message-queue-deployment-abc123 restarting continuously. CrashLoopBackOff state with 10 restarts in 5 minutes.
resolution: Identified missing environment variable DATABASE_URL. Added secret to deployment. Pod stable with 0 restarts.
resolution_notes: Identified missing environment variable DATABASE_URL. Added secret to deployment. Pod stable with 0 restarts.

title: CDN cache hit rate dropped below 60%
short_description: CDN cache hit rate dropped below 60%
description: Cache hit rate decreased from 85% to 55%. Increased load on origin servers.
resolution: Updated cache-control headers. Increased TTL from 1 hour to 4 hours for static assets. Hit rate improved to 82%.
resolution_notes: Updated cache-control headers. Increased TTL from 1 hour to 4 hours for static assets. Hit rate improved to 82%.

title: Database connection pool exhausted on email-service
short_description: Database connection pool exhausted on email-service
description: Connection pool reached maximum limit of 100 connections. New connection requests timing out after 30 seconds.
resolution: Increased max_connections from 100 to 200. Implemented connection pooling with PgBouncer. Added connection timeout monitoring.
resolution_notes: Increased max_connections from 100 to 200. Implemented connection pooling with PgBouncer. Added connection timeout monitoring.

title: Network latency spike between database and database
short_description: Network latency spike between database and database
description: Network latency increased from 5ms to 150ms. Affecting all database operations.
resolution: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.
resolution_notes: Identified network congestion on default VPC. Migrated to dedicated VPC with higher bandwidth. Latency normalized to 3ms.

title: Slow query performance on database database
short_description: Slow query performance on database database
description: Query execution time increased from 200ms to 8 seconds. Affecting user dashboard load times.
resolution: Created missing index on user_id column. Optimized JOIN operation. Query time reduced to 150ms. Added query performance monitoring.
resolution_notes: Created missing index on user_id column. Optimized JOIN operation. Query time reduced to 150ms. Added query performance monitoring.

title: Memory leak detected in email-service
short_description: Memory leak detected in email-service
description: Memory usage increasing steadily over 24 hours from 2GB to 7GB. Application not releasing memory after processing requests.
resolution: Identified memory leak in background job processor. Fixed unclosed database cursors. Deployed patch v2.3.1. Memory usage stable at 2.5GB.
resolution_notes: Identified memory leak in background job processor. Fixed unclosed database cursors. Deployed patch v2.3.1. Memory usage stable at 2.5GB.

title: Kubernetes pod crash loop on database
short_description: Kubernetes pod crash loop on database
description: Pod database-deployment-abc123 restarting continuously. CrashLoopBackOff state with 10 restarts in 5 minutes.
resolution: Identified missing environment variable DATABASE_URL. Added secret to deployment. Pod stable with 0 restarts.
resolution_notes: Identified missing environment variable DATABASE_URL. Added secret to deployment. Pod stable with 0 restarts.

resolution_notes: Restarted Istio control plane pods. Verified webhook configuration. Sidecar injection working on new deployments.

title: Redis cache cluster node failure
short_description: Redis cache cluster node failure
description: One of three Redis nodes in us-east1-b cluster failed. Cluster operating in degraded mode with reduced redundancy.
resolution: Replaced failed node. Rebalanced cluster slots. Verified data replication. All three nodes operational.
resolution_notes: Replaced failed node. Rebalanced cluster slots. Verified data replication. All three nodes operational.

title: SSL certificate expiring in 7 days for kubernetes-cluster
short_description: SSL certificate expiring in 7 days for kubernetes-cluster
description: SSL certificate for kubernetes-cluster.example.com expires on 2025-11-23. HTTPS connections will fail after expiration.
resolution: Renewed SSL certificate using Let's Encrypt. Updated cert-manager configuration. Set up automated renewal 30 days before expiry.
resolution_notes: Renewed SSL certificate using Let's Encrypt. Updated cert-manager configuration. Set up automated renewal 30 days before expiry.
